name: Attack of the Magic Cardboard!
description:
Anne and Roki traveled to the town of Endis looking to do some simple trading. However, their shopping trip is cut short when a group of cardboard creatures attacks. It's up to them to protect the townsfolk and stop this invasion!

Be sure to check out the bonus level when you beat the game!
